page.title: 09School Dinner Menu July 1985

Chicken Luncheon Roast Cod Sausage pie meat Pork Portions Rolls Duchesse fritters Roast Spaghetti Baked potatoes Chips Potatoes Peas beans Cabbage Tomatoes Carrots or Duchesse or Peas or Sausage potato Carrots or Peas Salad or Cheese Scones Fried Flan Salad fish cream Spaghetti Peas
